block.p: PACIFICARE HEALTH SYSTEMS INC., Santa Ana, Calif., the No. 1 operator of Medicare health maintenance organizations, said it would end its managed care operations in Ohio and Kentucky, where it has more than 60,000 customers.
JFAX.COM INC., Hollywood, a messaging company on the Internet, is changing its name to J2 Global Communications Inc.

PACIFICARE HEALTH SYSTEMS INC., Santa Ana, Calif., the No. 1 operator of Medicare health maintenance organizations, said it would end its managed care operations in Ohio and Kentucky, where it has more than 60,000 customers.
JFAX.COM INC., Hollywood, a messaging company on the Internet, is changing its name to J2 Global Communications Inc.

ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS INC., Minneapolis, which makes hardware and software used by phone, cable and Internet companies, will split its stock two shares for one on July 17 to shareholders of record as of June 26.

MOVIE STAR INC., New York, a maker of women's sleepwear and lingerie, said it hired First Union Securities Inc. to explore strategic and financial options after a 60 percent drop in its stock in the last year.
